---
title: "In-Class Exercise 1"
author: "Magdalene Chan"
date: 2023-11-18
---


## Getting started

The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if the required packages have been installed on the computer. If they are, the packages will be launched.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, tidyverse)
```
:::


### Import Passenger Volume by Origin Destination Bus Stops


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
odbus <- read_csv("data/aspatial/origin_destination_bus_202310.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Rows: 5694297 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (5): YEAR_MONTH, DAY_TYPE, PT_TYPE, ORIGIN_PT_CODE, DESTINATION_PT_CODE
dbl (2): TIME_PER_HOUR, TOTAL_TRIPS

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```
:::
:::


### Import Bus Stop Locations


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
BusStop <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                layer = "BusStop")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `BusStop' from data source 
  `C:\magdalenecjw\ISSS624 Geospatial\In_Class_Exercise\Ex1\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 5161 features and 3 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 3970.122 ymin: 26482.1 xmax: 48284.56 ymax: 52983.82
Projected CRS: SVY21
```
:::
:::


### Import Planning Subzone data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                layer = "MPSZ-2019")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
